biography:
Jacques Baratier was a French film director and screenwriter. He directed 21 films. His film Goha won the Jury Prize at the 1958 Cannes Film Festival. His 1962 film La poup√©e was entered for the 12th Berlin International Film Festival.

Goha was also shown as part of the Cannes Classics section of the 2013 Cannes Film Festival.
